name: Charuwat Sornkerd
introduce_yourself: Hello, my name is Charuwat Sonkerd, nickname Macky. I have been working for more than 2 years. Throughout this time, I have learned many things and developed myself. I will be committed to learning, working, and developing myself for the benefit of the organization. I am ready for new experiences and challenges. I hope you are interested in me.
work_line_1: Worked as a programmer at Thanes Development Co.,Ltd. for 2 years.
work_line_2: Internship at National Telecom Public Company Limited (NT) Sakon Nakhon Province for 4 months.
education_line_1: 2018-2022 Study Computer Engineering, Faculty of Science and Engineering, Kasetsart University, Sakon Nakhon Campus.
education_line_2: 2012-2017 Study at Sakonraj Wittayanukul School, Sakon Nakhon Province.
education_line_3: 2004-2011 Study at Sakon Nakhon Kindergarten School, Sakon Nakhon Province.
project_example__introduce_1: A showcase of my game development projects.
project_example__introduce_2: A collection of my pixel art designs.
